title: Virtual Meeting Scheduler
description: Developed a meeting scheduling system integrated with Google Calendar API and OAuth2. Automatically generates Google Meet links, manages attendee invitations, and syncs events.

title: Stripe Payment Integration
description: Integrated Stripe API for subscription management and payment processing. Implemented asynchronous webhooks for real-time updates like invoice and subscription changes.

title: Authentication & Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: Built secure JWT-based authentication with custom token refresh logic and implemented role-based access for different user types such as Employers and Candidates.

title: Custom Logging & Monitoring System
description: Designed a custom logging framework with dedicated handlers for API access logs, security logs, and exceptions. Improved system observability and debugging.

title: Recipe Box
description: Feature-rich web app for managing personal recipes with authentication, search, and category-based organization.

title: Employee Management App
description: CRUD-based employee management system with roles, departments, and dashboards for efficient record handling.

title: Note Saving App
description: Secure note-keeping web app allowing users to create, edit, and delete personal notes with authentication and authorization.

title: Poetry Sharing App
description: Community-driven platform for sharing and liking poems, complete with author profiles and content moderation.

title: Blog Application
description: Dynamic blogging platform enabling users to write, publish, and manage posts. Includes commenting, category filtering, and user profiles.
